summary: ETAP 2 Simulated Portfolio (Copy-Mechanics) testing completed on ActorProfile page. All features working correctly across different actor types.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes for automated testing - recommend adding for Starting Capital input, period selector buttons, and key display elements

action_items: Consider adding data-testid attributes to Simulated Portfolio components for better test automation
critical_code_review_comments: Calculation formula correctly implemented: actorFinalValue = simCapital * (1 + periodData.actorReturn / 100)
Different actors show appropriate risk levels (Vitalik: good copy candidate, Jump Trading: HFT impossible to copy, a16z: institutional stable returns)
Impact by Entry Delay table correctly shows Optimal/Acceptable/Risky/Avoid recommendations based on actor type
seed_data_creation: N/A - all data is MOCKED on frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: ETAP 2 Simulated Portfolio fully tested. All simulatedPortfolio data is mocked in ActorProfile.jsx for each actor.

Simulated_Portfolio_Block_Renders.details: Simulated Portfolio block renders correctly on ActorProfile page with Calculator icon, BETA badge, and all sub-components

Starting_Capital_Input.details: Starting Capital input accepts numbers (tested 10000, 25000) and updates calculations correctly

Period_Selector_7d_30d_90d.details: Period selector buttons (7d/30d/90d) switch between periods correctly with visual feedback (bg-indigo-600 for selected)

Actor_Return_Display.details: Actor's Return shows correct calculated values - Vitalik 30d: +18.5%, Jump Trading 30d: +22.4%, a16z 30d: +8.4%

Follower_Return_Display.details: Your Simulated Return shows correct values - Vitalik: +9.2%, Jump Trading: -5.2% (negative as expected for HFT), a16z: +7.8%

Return_Gap_Breakdown.details: Return Gap breakdown shows slippage and delay costs with visual bar representation

Impact_By_Entry_Delay_Table.details: Impact by Entry Delay table shows correct recommendations - Vitalik: Optimal/Acceptable/Risky/Not recommended, Jump Trading: all Avoid, a16z: Optimal/Optimal/Acceptable/Acceptable

Trade_Statistics_Collapse_Expand.details: Trade Statistics section expands/collapses correctly showing Trades, Winners, Avg Win, Avg Loss

Recent_Trades_PnL_Comparison.details: Recent Trades shows Actor vs You PnL comparison - e.g., ARB trade: Actor +8.2%, You +5.1%

Different_Actors_Different_Data.details: Tested Vitalik (good copy candidate), Jump Trading (HFT - negative follower returns), a16z (institutional - stable returns) - all show appropriate different data

Calculation_Formula_Verification.details: Formula actorFinalValue = simCapital * (1 + periodData.actorReturn / 100) verified - $10,000 @ 18.5% = $11,850 âœ“

mocked_data_note: All simulatedPortfolio data is MOCKED on frontend in ActorProfile.jsx - includes periods, trades, impactByDelay for each actor
